response.body:
{
  "description" : "Receive timely updates with the latest blog posts.",
  "id" : "7148714",
  "legalBasis" : "CONSENT_WITH_NOTICE",
  "legalBasisExplanation" : "At users request, we opted them out",
  "name" : "Default HubSpot Blog Subscription",
  "preferenceGroupName" : "Initial Group",
  "sourceOfStatus" : "SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS",
  "status" : "NOT_SUBSCRIBED"
}

schema.description: The status of a subscription for a contact.

brandId.description: The ID of the brand that the subscription is associated with, if there is one.

legalBasis.description: The legal reason for the current status of the subscription.

legalBasisExplanation.description: A more detailed explanation to go with the legal basis.

preferenceGroupName.description: The name of the preferences group that the subscription is associated with.

sourceOfStatus.description: Where the status is determined from e.g. PORTAL_WIDE_STATUS if the contact opted out from the portal.

mappings.name: Get subscription statuses for a contact

schema.description: A collection of subscription statuses for a contact.

subscriptionStatuses.description: A list of all of the contact's subscriptions statuses.
